entry.title: 'Hello World'
entry.summary: So, I want to do stuff, I decided. The thing is, stuff is a pretty broad concept and I am not sure what exactly I want this stuff to be - yet. But consuming stuff for nearly three decades now, I think it is time to finally create some stuff myself. Lets see how it goes.

entry.title: Enter the Indie Web
entry.summary: The Internet is dead, long live the Internet!

entry.title: The virtuality of reality
entry.summary: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality Open your eyes, look up to the skies and see
